Or you means I should not use the layer in tensorflow.contrib.layers? If so, I'm trying it at the same time, but coming across with a new problem...

body:
@yaroslavvb It seems that the results are different even if I kept all the conditions the same, so I'm having difficulty control a specific op, since PyTorch and Tensorflow are two distinct framework.

Or you means I should not use the layer in **tensorflow.contrib.layers**? If so, I'm trying it at the same time, but coming across with a new problem...
